metadata.title: CVE-2025-21176 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: .NET, .NET Framework, and Visual Studio Remote Code Execution Vulnerability:Insufficient input data validation leads to heap-based buffer overflow inmsdia140.dll. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by loading a speciallycrafted file in Visual Studio.

criterions.comment: dotnet6 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
dotnet7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
dotnet8 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
dotnet8 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
dotnet8 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
